Articles.Content:
i would like to say that i have played ksp for quite a bit of time now and it was time to get an account here.

i have never done anything in any forums so guide me to wisdom!

thank you all

-admiral9347

Hello admiral9347. You may already have seen this explanation of frequently asked questions, and there's an informal advice guide here, and an official set of forum rules here. If those don't answer your questions, feel free to ask them here. Welcome to the forum.
meanwhile...i have made this ufo:
why thank you, you are very kind, i do have a question in fact...i was wondering as time goes will i be able to put higher resolution images into my avatar?

Unfortunately, the avatar restriction is uniform for all general users. We moderators do have higher resolution avatars, but that's not so much out of status as it is to help with easier identification of moderator posts and actions.
